A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is AMAZING\, the thing about this movie is that it takes bold and incredibly different directions than what Hard-Core fans expect and want\, this is not a bad thing\, it actually makes the movie more unique\, it is not a typical Star Wars movie\, but it definitely is Star Wars\, it's action sequences are truly breathtaking and amazing in every way. The movie is far from perfect\, but it is truly incredible\, it is a lot to process\, so it should be watched at least twice\, each time you watch it you will love it more.
